item.title: Rsync including hidden files
item.description: If you need to rsync those hidden directories or files starting with dot, do it something like below (not the trailing /) rsync -avz -e ssh --progress user@source-server:/somedirA/ somedirB/ See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9046749/rsync-not-synchronizing-htaccess-file

item.title: iptables: Allow Specific IP to Connect via SSH.
item.description: iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 114.191.33.88 --dport 22 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT iptables -A OUTPUT -p tcp --sport 22 -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT

item.title: Replace SSH Connectivity via Paramiko
item.description: When an issue such as “Timeout, waiting for priviledged escalation” happens Run the playbook as follows: ansible-playbook -c paramiko ansible/ansible-usermgr.yml -i "cool.example.com, " -vvv suggested in https://github.com/ansible/ansible/issues/14426
